import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './material-dashboard.css'; import BookList from './BookList'; import BookListView from './BookListView'; const MainPage = () =>{ const [Books, setBooks] = useState(null); const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false); const [User, setUser] = useState(null); const [showBookView, setShowBookView] = useState(false); const [showListView, setListView] = useState(false); const books = [ { id: 2, title: "Thales'in maceraları", readDate: "2021-09-01", addedDate: "2021-09-01", cover: '2', description: kitaplar eklenebilir ]; const handleLibraryClick = () => { setIsActive(!isActive); // Aktif durumu tersine çevirir setShowBookView(true); }; const handleListViewClick = () => { setIsActive(!isActive); // Aktif durumu tersine çevirir setListView(true); }; useEffect(() => { const fetchBooks = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(''); setBooks(response); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching books', error); } } const fetchUser = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(''); setUser(response); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching user data', error); } } fetchBooks(); fetchUser(); }, []); if (!Books) return
